title: Violence between Arabs and Jews inside Israel further inflame Gaza conflict
content:
1. Violence between Arabs and Jews inside Israel further inflame Gaza conflict  Haaretz
  2. 'We're watching a lynching': Jewish crowd in Israel beats Arab man as country erupts in unrest  JTA News - Jewish Telegraphic Agency
  3. Jewish-Arab violence rolls through cities like wildfire, with police overwhelmed  The Times of Israel
  4. Jewish Residents of Lod Endure a Pogrom of Mob Violence and Terror - Synagogues, homes, businesses and vehicles ransacked and burned  Chabad.org
  5. What does Hamas really want?  Religion News Service
